newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: SNB policy best way to check SFR in EMU.
newsitem.headline: SNB policy best way to check SFR in EMU.

text.p: Swiss National Bank (SNB) vice president Jean-Pierre Roth said monetary policy was the prefered tool to offset possible gains in the Swiss franc after the onset of Economic and Monetary Union (EMU).
He said such policy should be followed even if it meant the SNB risked not achieving its strict targets for price stability at all times.

"If the demand for the Swiss franc as a result of uncertainty tied to monetary union should increase, then monetary policy should be eased enough to neutralise the deflationary effects of the increased demand for francs," Roth said in a speech.
The speech was to be delivered at an international legal conference here.
